sourcesContent:
import friendRequest from '../../static/friendRequest.svg' import './ContentList.css'; import Datas from './Datas' import React, { useState } from 'react'; import time from '../../functions/time' import back from './back.png' import profile from '../../static/defaultprofile.svg' import profile1 from '../../static/profile.jpg' import audio from './audio.png' import emoji from './emoji.png' import more from './more.png' function ContentList() { const [route, setRoute] = useState('content') const onRouteChange = (route) => { setRoute(route) console.log(route) } const loadRequests = () => { onRouteChange('request') } const loadContents = () => { onRouteChange('content') } const loadChat = () => { onRouteChange('chat') } const changeTime = (t) => { return time(t) } if (route === 'request') { return (
Friend Requests

幼儿园同学
留言：好兄弟，好久不见，借我点钱。
张一二三四
留言：你好，久仰大名，希望有机会合作。
儿子和女儿
留言：爹。
) } if (route === 'chat') { return (

你最近在忙什么呢？
我啊，我学前端...
你呢
好兄弟，看在小学同学的份上，借我50
你学计算机啊，掉头发的
好兄弟，看在小学同学的份上，借我50
好兄弟，看在小学同学的份上，借我50
) } const loadFriends = () => { const friends = Datas() const friendsList = friends.map(friend =>

{friend.notification}

{friend.name}
{changeTime(friend.time)}
{friend.message}
) return friendsList } return (

); } export default ContentList;
